Quaternion Function Reference

eq

== Equal
(Quaternion and octonion overloadings of standard MATLAB® function)

Syntax

r = eq(a, b)

Description

eq implements the MATLAB® equality operator == for quaternion arrays.

See Also

QTFM function: neq
MATLAB® function: eq
